system.description:
Your relic is a sacred thing and while it is not sentient, the presence of its holiness rubs off on you despite your own intention. If you would do something genuinely malicious or cruel, the Narrator may require you to make a Charisma saving throw. (Attacking known enemies does not count under most circumstances; a repentant enemy that has surrendered is a notable exception.) On a failure, you hesitate and cannot take the planned action this round, though you can choose a different action in its place; the new action must be non-violent in nature.

You also gain proficiency with the Religion skill and a specialty in holy symbols.

Additionally, when you gain a level, you can choose to change your destiny to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-destinies.Item.35clu7k24yeabt8b]{Atonement}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-destinies.Item.mhu7yhrnm9dd1hme]{Devotion}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-destinies.Item.8dnwjetmzkpw9b8q]{Saint}.
